titles.title: In My Heart There Rings a Melody

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I have a song that Jesus gave me, It was sent from heav'n above; There never was a sweeter melody, 'Tis a melody of love.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: I love the Christ who died on Calv'ry, For He washed my sins away; He put within my heart a melody, And I know it's there to stay.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 'Twill be my endless theme in glory, With the angels I will sing; 'Twill be a song with glorious harmony, When the courts of heaven ring.
